description: This source file contains Python test cases for the 'LightningjsTemplate' class, part of a project scaffolding and initialization system. It uses pytest fixtures and test functions to validate project template initialization, configuration loading, and execution of post-processing scripts within a Lightningjs project setup context.

classes.name: ProjectConfig
classes.description: Configuration class for defining project parameters, including name, version, description, author, type, output path, and custom parameters.

classes.name: ProjectType
classes.description: Enumeration defining various project types, including 'LIGHTNINGJS'.

classes.name: TemplateInitInfo
classes.description: Class holding initialization information for project templates, such as environment commands and descriptions.

classes.name: ProjectInitializer
classes.description: Main class responsible for initializing projects from templates and configurations, executing post-processing scripts, and loading configs.

classes.name: TemplateProvider
classes.description: Provides and manages project templates, including creation and registration.

classes.name: LightningjsTemplate
classes.description: Template class specific to Lightningjs projects, encapsulating methods to get initialization info and perform project setup.

methods.name: get_init_info
methods.description: Retrieves initialization info such as commands and instructions for setting up a Lightningjs project.

methods.name: initialize_project
methods.description: Executes project initialization, file generation, and post-processing; returns success status.

methods.name: wait_for_post_process_completed
methods.description: Waits for the completion of post-processing scripts executed during project setup.

methods.name: load_config
methods.description: Loads project configuration from a JSON or YAML file into a ProjectConfig object.
